attributes.action: Keep NHS free at the point of use. No charges, no to treatment  only if you pay
attributes.additional_details:
Return the NHS 
Free at the point of need,
Funded by general taxation,
Publicly owned managed and  provided,
A comprehensive service (all the necessary treatments).
A universal service, available to all the people.
We call for funding for the NHS to match Western European countries.
Every £1 spent on health care returns £3  to the country in wealth and much more in health and happiness
We call for the reversal of privatisation in the NHS 
A "pause"  is not good enough. Scrap the charges.
attributes.background: "My Choice"  is a scheme where patients are charged for treatments, previously available on the NHS.  Launched by Warrington and Halton Hospital this is part of a national pattern of treatment restrictions.  Individual charges are unacceptable + discriminate against the poor.  Reinstate the NHS.
